header_text: You're talking to a coworker about a presentation you're working on, and they seem really interested. They ask if they can look at it, and you agree. Before you send the slides to them, you look over it and feel good.

elements.Text: Are you worried about what your coworker thinks of your presentation?

elements.name: You're talking to a coworker about a presentation you're working on, and they seem really interested. They ask if they can look at it, and you agree. Before you send the slides to them, you look over it and feel good. _Mental Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
